Welcome, RKS Hosting: 8€/month for a 2GB VPS with Tons of Bandwidth in Kosovo!

cheap vps, kosovo, openvz, RKS Hosting, rkshosting October 27, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

Hello, RKS Hosting!

They’re a hosting company in Kosovo and have a nice offer for a cheap VPS:

  • 8€/month for a 2GB VPS with 50GB of space and 64TB (!) of bandwidth!

We’ve had a few offers from Kosovo in the past but it’s still a rare geography, so it’s pretty cool to see such a big system available at a reasonable price.

RKS Hosting is registered in Republic of Kosovo. Their Terms of Service is available on their web site (Privacy Policy). They accept Credit/Debit Cards and Bitcoin.

Here’s a little about RKS Hosting in their own words:

We are a Full-Service Datacenter in Kosovo providing everything from Shared Hosting to Seedboxes to VPS up to full cages on request. The first Datacenter to be established in Kosovo with a full range of services provided to the public. Originally started in early 2020 to provide services to select local clients, now officially registered and providing service to the international public as of mid-2021. Kosovo is a small a young country born out of a war with neighboring Serbia. Our goal is to help it be a leader into the future of IT services on the European continent. We are doing this through building digital links between lands and bridging divides through technology.

If you decide to give RKS Hosting a try, please tell others how it goes in the comments below.

Now read more to see the offer!

OFFER

  • 2GB RAM
  • 1GB Swap
  • 2x vCPU
  • 50GB SSD space
  • 64TB transfer
  • 1Gbps uplink
  • 1x IPv4
  • /64 IPv6 (1 Mounted)
  • OpenVZ/SolusVM
  • Coupon: LEB20 (20% off)
  • 10€/month before discount
  • 8€/month with discount
  • Offer Expires on 22 NOV 2021
  • [ORDER]

NETWORK INFO:

  • RKS HOSTING LLC – FUSHE KOSOVE, KOSOVO
  • Test IPv4: 37.35.69.108
  • Test File 1GB: https://www.rkshosting.com/network/1GB.bin
  • Test File 500MB: https://www.rkshosting.com/network/500MB.bin
  • Test File 100MB: https://www.rkshosting.com/network/100MB.bin
  • Test FIle 10MB: https://www.rkshosting.com/network/10MB.bin

HOST NODE INFO:

  • 2x Intel(R) Xeon(R) CPU X5670 @ 2.93GHz (24CPU)
  • 70GB RAM + 65GB NVME SSD SWAP
  • 8x 2TB SSDs
  • Hardware RAID10
  • 4x1Gbps uplink + 1ENO 1GBPS
Please let us know if you have any questions/comments and enjoy!
